Synthesis and preliminary pharmacologica: [["Synthesis", "of", "1-(1,2-dihydro-2-acenaphthylenyl) piperazine derivatives"], ["1-(1,2-dihydro-2-acenaphthylenyl) piperazine derivatives", "as", "potential atypical antipsychotic agents"], ["Dopaminergic system", "can be modulated through", "manipulation of the serotonergic system"], ["1-(1,2-dihydro-2-acenaphthylenyl) piperazine (7)", "synthesis and preliminary pharmacological evaluation of", "potential atypical antipsychotic agents"], ["Compound 7e", "showed significant affinities at", "5-HT1A and 5-HT2A receptors"], ["Compound 7e", "showed moderate affinity at", "D2 receptor"], ["Compound 7e", "exhibits a high reversal of", "catalepsy induced by haloperidol"]]
